tool_description: Creates platform-specific asset bundles from provided files, ensuring proper formats, resolutions, and naming conventions for app store submission.

app_icon_paths.description: Paths to app icon files in various resolutions

bundle_name.description: Name for the output asset bundle

optimize_assets.description: Whether to optimize asset file sizes

error_messages: Missing required icons: Each platform requires specific icon resolutions - provide all required sizes.
Invalid image format: Only PNG, JPEG formats supported. iOS icons must be PNG.
Screenshot requirements not met: Minimum 2 screenshots required, maximum varies by platform.
File not found: One or more specified asset paths do not exist or are inaccessible.
Unsupported platform: Only 'ios' and 'android' platforms are supported.
Promotional assets missing: When include_promotional is true, promotional_paths cannot be empty.
Image resolution invalid: Assets must meet platform-specific resolution requirements.
usage: Provide arrays of paths to app icons and screenshots, specify target platform and bundle name. Optionally enable promotional assets and optimization. Tool creates properly formatted asset bundles.

bundle_path.description: Path to the created asset bundle file

bundle_size.description: Size of the created bundle in MB

validation_results.description: Asset validation results and any warnings
